title: Woke up this morning to a Push notification on my iPod...
body:
Riot Games e-mailing me for a password reset at 7AM? I hopped out of bed (at 9) and powered on my computer, unlocking my iPod to check the e-mail. Sure enough it was sitting in there. Open League, log in...user/password combo incorrect. As I look back down at my iPod, it starts updating from the mail server and the e-mail I'm looking at goes poof. I check the trash, not there, but the push notification says it exists.

Hop over to my e-mail account settings...seems there's a strange login location from china that had been accessed recently. Completely different login credentials from my League account, so that has me baffled. Either way, after changing the credentials on both, I have to come back here and ask for any sort of info on my account that transpired within the last day. After my jungle Kled game from last night I logged out, so...any activity between then and now I'd like to be aware of.

replies.body: I was reading this and understood that you are being account hacked or someone tried to and saw the word "Baffled" I didn't read that correctly and almost had a heart attack dad I didn't do anythinggg

I did look into this for you, but due to the nature of sensitive information on a public venue, there's not much I can confirm without further discussion.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can provide any context needed.  I also recommend using our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) just in case for safety practices in and outside of League.  I believe everything to be okay, but it wouldn't hurt to  get a pulse check with us to make sure!
